segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the water gushing over the sink edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate, back turned to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron, so proper, but foot in water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, the boy's on a stool that's leaning back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's arm is up, waiting expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Didn't expect the kids to be so bold behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a calm garden, totally unexpected contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widening fast, she still hasn't turned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, ready to give.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies spilling a bit, what a sneaky surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This ordinary kitchen hides so much action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm caught off guard by the impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets make it all feel exposed.
segments.speaker: PAR
